segments.text: Oh, the joy of a secret cookie raid!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that boy, he's so determined to get those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching himself to the limit for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he's balancing on that wobbly stool is impressive, if a bit terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl, her face full of anticipation, hand reaching out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must feel like they're getting away with something grand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The "COOKIE JAR" label is almost taunting the unsuspecting adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper unfolding before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get a good haul before they're caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a heartwarming scene of sibling cooperation, despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to have some happy memories of this.
segments.speaker: PAR
